title.narrative: Support to Water Sector Development in Africa 2005-2009

description.narrative:
The Danish support to the African Development Bank's (AfDB) water and sanitation sector should be seen as a contribution to the continent's efforts to achieve the 2015 targets for sustainable development.
The funds are channeled through 3 water initiatives by the AfDB, and they hereby also represents the programmes components:
1. The Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Initiative (RWSSI) 2. The African Water Facility (AWF) 3. The Water Partnership Programme
The grant covers a total of DKK 300 million over a 5 year period (2005-2009). The grant is allocated as follows: AWF: 40, RWSSI: 230, WPP: 15. The remaining DKK 15 million will be administered by the MFA for technical assistance (3 million), monitoring & reviews (5 million) and unallocated funds (7 million).
The Danish support is provided in addition to assistance from other multilateral and bilateral partners.
